title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 700.2 - Scope
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 700.2 - Scope

State Regulations
A congestion surcharge is imposed on intra-state
transportation provided in for-hire vehicles that begins in, ends in, or passes
through the congestion zone. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
700.2

Adopted

New

York State Register August 21, 2019/Volume XLI, Issue 34, eff. 8/21/2019

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
